Description
<<<<<<< HEAD It gives a lowpass analog Chebyshev type I prototype filter of nth order and with a Peak-to-peak passband ripple of Rp. ======= This is an Octave function. It designs a lowpass analog Chebyshev type I filter of nth order and with a Peak-to-peak passband ripple of Rp. >>>>>>> 6bbb00d0f0128381ee95194cf7d008fb6504de7d
